hero.headline: Discover Vintage Fashion That Tells Your Story
hero.subheading: Every piece in our collection has a history. Find unique, sustainable fashion that speaks to your individual style—from timeless classics to bold statement pieces.

brandStory.title: The Peakees Story
brandStory.subtitle: Born from a passion for sustainable fashion and the belief that every piece of clothing has a story worth telling
brandStory.lead: We started Peakees because we believe fashion should be personal, sustainable, and timeless.
brandStory.paragraph1: In a world of fast fashion, we curate vintage and second-hand pieces that have character, history, and quality craftsmanship. Each item in our collection is carefully selected not just for its style, but for its story and potential to become part of your unique narrative.
brandStory.paragraph2: From timeless denim jackets to elegant vintage dresses, from rare books to classic games—we believe in offering pieces that transcend trends and speak to individual style and values.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.description: Giving pre-loved fashion a second life reduces waste and environmental impact.

curated.title: Curated
curated.description: Every piece is hand-selected for quality, style, and authenticity.

inclusive.title: Inclusive
inclusive.description: Fashion for everyone—men, women, teens, kids, and beyond.

unique.title: Unique
unique.description: Find one-of-a-kind pieces that express your individual style.

valuePropositions.title: Why Choose Peakees?
valuePropositions.subtitle: We're committed to providing an exceptional shopping experience with sustainable, high-quality vintage fashion

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly Fashion
ecoFriendly.description: Reduce your environmental footprint with sustainable, pre-loved clothing that's both stylish and responsible.

quality.title: Quality Guaranteed
quality.description: Every item is carefully inspected and curated to meet our high standards for condition and authenticity.

uniqueFinds.title: Unique Finds
uniqueFinds.description: Discover one-of-a-kind vintage pieces and rare items you won't find anywhere else.

shipping.title: Fast & Secure Shipping
shipping.description: Quick, reliable delivery with secure packaging to ensure your items arrive in perfect condition.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: Shop with confidence using our secure payment system with multiple payment options.

returns.title: Easy Returns
returns.description: Not completely satisfied? Our hassle-free return policy ensures you shop with confidence.

socialProof.title: What Our Customers Say
socialProof.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who've found their perfect vintage pieces

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: I found the most incredible vintage denim jacket on Peakees. The quality was amazing and it's become my signature piece. Love knowing I'm shopping sustainably!

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.content: As someone who cares about the environment, Peakees is perfect. Every purchase feels good knowing I'm giving pre-loved items a new life while getting unique pieces.

emma.name: Emma Rodriguez
emma.content: The curation at Peakees is exceptional. I've found rare vintage pieces I couldn't find anywhere else. Their attention to quality and authenticity is unmatched.

david.name: David Park
david.content: Peakees has become my go-to for unique fashion finds. The variety is incredible - from classic pieces to bold statement items. Plus, the shopping experience is seamless.

lisa.name: Lisa Wang
lisa.content: I love that I can find professional vintage pieces that stand out in the best way. Peakees helps me express my personality while maintaining a polished look.

alex.name: Alex Thompson
alex.content: Shopping at Peakees for my family feels great. Quality clothes for my kids that have history and character, plus I'm teaching them about sustainable choices.

cta.badge: Ready to Start Your Vintage Journey?
cta.headline: Your Perfect Vintage Piece is Waiting
cta.subheading: Join thousands of fashion-forward individuals who've discovered the joy of sustainable, unique style. Start exploring our curated collection today.

about.title: About Peakees
about.subtitle: Your premium e-commerce destination for quality products
about.ourStoryPara1: Peakees is a modern e-commerce platform built to deliver exceptional shopping experiences. We specialize in curating high-quality products across multiple categories, ensuring our customers find exactly what they're looking for.
about.ourStoryPara2: Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with user-friendly design to create a seamless shopping experience from browse to checkout.
about.ourMissionPara: To provide customers with access to premium products while maintaining the highest standards of service, security, and satisfaction.
about.getInTouchPara: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

meta.defaultDescription: Unique second-hand clothing, shoes, toys and books in Israel. Quality pre-owned fashion for everyone.
meta.aboutTitle: About Us | Peakees - Premium E-commerce Experience
meta.aboutDescription: Learn about Peakees's mission to provide exceptional shopping experiences with curated products, secure payments, and outstanding customer service.
